User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the system, either an admin or a representative.

phone.description: The user's phone number, used for OTP login for representatives.

email.description: The user's email address, used for login for admins.

city.description: The ID of the city this user is assigned to.

active.description: Whether the user account is active.

createdBy.description: The UID of the admin who created this user.

City.title: City
City.description: Represents a city for which presentations are available.

Slide.title: Slide
Slide.description: Represents a single, reusable slide template in the global library.

url.description: URL of the slide image in Firebase Storage.

number.description: The unique number identifying the slide.

medicineName.description: The name of the medicine featured on the slide.

storagePath.description: The path to the image file in Firebase Storage.

Doctor.title: Doctor
Doctor.description: Represents a doctor, associated with a city and a set of selected slides for their presentation.

city.description: The city where the doctor is located.

selectedSlides.description: Array of slide numbers selected by an admin for this doctor's presentation.

Presentation.title: Presentation
Presentation.description: Represents a generated PDF file for a specific doctor.

doctorId.description: Reference to the Doctor this presentation is for.

city.description: The city associated with this presentation, for easier querying.

pdfUrl.description: The download URL for the generated .pdf file in Firebase Storage.

updatedBy.description: The UID of the admin who last triggered the update.

dirty.description: Flag to trigger regeneration. Set to true when a change is made.

Request.title: Request
Request.description: Represents a request from a representative to update doctor or slide information.

repId.description: The UID of the representative making the request.

doctorId.description: The ID of an existing doctor for whom the update is requested.

doctorName.description: The name of a proposed new doctor.

doctorCity.description: The city of a proposed new doctor.

selectedSlides.description: Array of slide numbers proposed by the representative.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the request was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile data, including their role and assigned city.

/cities/{cityId}.description: Stores the list of active cities.

/slides/{slideId}.description: Global library of master slide templates.

/doctors/{doctorId}.description: Stores doctor information and their assigned slide numbers.

/presentations/{presentationId}.description: Stores metadata and links for generated PDF files.

/requests/{requestId}.description: Stores change requests submitted by representatives.
